text:
Galicia, Spain | Full Time | WebRTC QA engineers

Company: http://www.quobis.com Job Specs: http://www.quobis.com/images/stories/qa%20webrtc%20engineer%...

My colleagues of Quobis are hiring. They are based in Galicia, north-west of Spain, 7 km to Portugal.

They need QA WebRTC engineer. They are on the top of WebRTC companies in the world + they had more than 50 webrtc POC in more than 37 countries.

Quobis is located in Galicia, where you can rent a 3 bedroom flat for €350 pm, and you can live in front of the beach for €500 pm. In the other hand, Galicia is knowing as Galifornia.

http://www.quobis.com/index.php?option=com_content&task=view...

I worked for them and all was perfect. Leave that position was one of my worst decision ever!
